title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Danger        Heat Advisory  Alert 1 , Severity ,danger ,, Heat Advisory  Please be advised that the forecast calls for high temperature and humidity for the New York metropolitan area through Monday (Heat index over 100F). The interior of the Theodore Roosevelt Home is not air-conditioned. Please plan accordingly; drink water.                All visitor-accessible grounds, structures, and activities are operating normally.  Learn more about Operating Hours, Fees, Reservations, and bringing your pets to Sagamore Hill. Learn more about the Theodore Roosevelt Home Rehabilitation project which has been completed. The Theodore Roosevelt Home is open to the public by guided tour only. The Visitor Center and Old Orchard Museum are open to the public without a tour. Before you start your journey to Sagamore Hill, make sure to check the weather.  We look forward to your visit!
